title: Fire & Shadow
description: Normal people sneak out to a party and have fun. Maya Rao ends the evening by incinerating the guy who attacks her.Nik Lucas, sexy, new in town and totally forbidden, happens to walk in on her. Normal guys would run for the hills. Nik knows a whole lot more than he's telling.Maya doesn't believe the gods are real, doesn't waste her time with mere mythology. But when gods, demons and hellhounds become the new normal and wielding fire becomes her new skill, she must decide what it is she really believes.Can Maya accept that normal is something she will never be because it isn't normal to be ...The Hand of Kali.A new Paranormal coming of age series delving in the fantasy and magic of Hindu mythology and its plethora of gods, demons, legends & mythology.
author: T.G. Ayer
